channel.title: rules on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in rules on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.2: Two weeks in the USA
item.description: 2nd July 2014 Hello everyone, Today I took the drivers’ written test and passed with flying colours. I got all answers correct! I studied hard for the last couple of days although I was preparing using videos even sometime last week.

item.title: What I learnt from my Grandmother
item.description: On Gandhi’s birthday I think of two people. One is my cousin who shares his birthday and the other is my maternal grandma who taught me most of what I know about Gandhian values.
